settings.question: Cyanocobalamin B-12
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: CYANOCOBALAMIN B-12

Cyanocobalamin is a synthetic Vitamin B-12 used to prevent and treat low levels of Vitamin B12 in your system. Vitamin B-12 maintains the health of metabolism, blood cells, and nerve cells. Low levels of B-12 can lead to anemia (low red blood cell levels), stomach and GI issues, and nerve damage.

settings.question: Bergamot
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: OPTIMAL HEALTH

Your body uses cholesterol to create healthy cells, but too much cholesterol can increase your risk of heart disease. Different options are available for treating high cholesterol, including bergamot extract. Bergamot is a citrus fruit derived from the citrus bergamia plant, and the oil and extract are used in medicinal preparations to lower cholesterol.

Benefits:

• Lowers cholesterol

• Improves mental clarity

• Relieves anxiety

• Reduces joint pain

settings.question: Core Restore
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: WEIGHT MANAGEMENT

Core Restore is a 7-day detox program designed to detoxify the organs of the body, with particular emphasis on restoring the liver to optimal function. Core Restore begins with a 2-day fast, followed by 5 days of a 1,200 calorie diet. Foods allowed on the program include grilled chicken, quinoa salad, mixed fruit, and raspberry salad. Bread, sugar, caffeine, and alcohol are some of the foods to be avoided during the Core Restore cleanse.

Benefits:

• Removes toxin build-up

• Improves metabolism

• Increases energy

• Boosts mood

• Improves regularity

settings.question: AdreneVive®
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: OPTIMAL HEALTH

AdreneVive® is a dietary supplement that contains a mix of adaptogenic botanicals and nutrients. It is specially formulated to combat the effects of stress and maintain natural energy levels. Ingredients include L-theanine, Ashwagandha root extract, Rhodiola rosea root extract, and Eleuthero root extract.

Benefits:

• Relieves stress

• Improves cognitive function

• Improves athletic performance

• Supports immune function

settings.question: Nutrafol
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: HAIR GROWTH

Nutrafol is a multivitamin that is clinically proven to boost hair growth in men and women. Shedding or thinning hair may occur due to factors such as, poor nutrition, oxidative stress, inflammation, and hormone imbalance. The ingredients in Nutrafol target these underlying factors to promote hair growth from the inside out and support whole-body health. Marine collagen, Sensoril® ashwagandha, saw palmetto, and curcumin, are essential ingredients in Nutrafol.

Benefits:

• Reduces scalp inflammation

• Balances cortisol

• Promotes hormone health

• Improves sleep
